content: There are sooooooo many it could be any of the DVGers or from days past; OldMole, usmc_family and many other or all of the moderator that have tolerated and trained me. But the one who has, IMN2BHO, helped more members than anyone in the history of military.com – I give you the very humbled, un-opinionated one who always manages to stay above the fray, my good friend and your good friend, the Lady from West Virginia: Cider33_Alpha on top of everything else she went back on full time active duty just past her 39th birthday, and that is special. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

content: There are sooooooo many it could be any of the DVGers or from days past; OldMole, usmc_family and many other or all of the moderator that have tolerated and trained me. But the one who has, IMN2BHO, helped more members than anyone in the history of military.com – I give you the very humbled, un-opinionated one who always manages to stay above the fray, my good friend and your good friend, the Lady from West Virginia: Cider33_Alpha on top of everything else she went back on full time active duty just past her 39th birthday, and that is special. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans
title: Complimentary...

content: There are a whole lot of people who are good folk on this site. To name one or two might make others feel snubbed so, I'll start off with saying that anyone who has been a regular at Renees, Mikees, the Illness Thread, and over at the Wepupa Tribe are top notch folk - - That said,,, I'say Super Chief MainDawg, and Crew Chief Sidewinder will be my first to HOOOHAW!! because they were the first I got to know around here. Talking to them off and on for the last couple of years has meant a lot - ahey Wandering and Wondering
